sentences.en: A large portion of this cost devolves upon the patient.
sentences.cn: 这笔费用的很大一部分落在病人身上。

sentences.en: A portion of the cardia is demonstrated above the diaphragm.
Beauty's a portion, and good temper with it is a double portion.
sentences.cn: 美貌可以说是一份妆奁, 好脾气则更是一份妆奁.

sentences.en: Damage was confined to a small portion of the castle.
sentences.cn: 城堡仅有一小部分受损。

sentences.en: Desserts can be substituted by a portion of fresh fruit.
sentences.cn: 餐后甜点可以用一份新鲜水果代替。

sentences.en: Do you have any children’s portions?

sentences.cn: 每个孩子吃自己的一份食物.

sentences.en: I had learnt a portion of the Koran.
I have spent a fairly considerable portion of my life here.
sentences.cn: 我生命中相当长的一段时光是在这里度过的。

sentences.en: Insurance can represent a significant portion of the total price of a holiday.
sentences.cn: 度假总费用里保险费可能会占据相当大的一部分。

sentences.en: She ordered a portion of fried eggs.
So has my portion been meted out to me.
The front portion of the rocket breaks off.
The plasma is the liquid portion of blood that is free of cells .
sentences.cn: 血浆是血液的液体部分，不包含各种细胞。

sentences.en: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker.
sentences.cn: 卖方经纪人须随后将部分佣金分给买方经纪人。

sentences.en: Three thousand dollars is no more than a portion.
You are paid your portion not later than a week.
sentences.cn: 不会晚于一周你就可以得到你那一部分报酬.

phrases.tran_cn: 把(食品、土地、财产等)分成几份；把某物分成若干份；按比例分配

trans.tran_cn: 一部分，一份遗产（或赠与的财产），嫁妆，分得的财产
trans.tran_en: a part of something larger, especially a part that is different from the other parts

trans.tran_cn: 把…分成份额，分配，把…分给(to)，命运注定
